Ken,

The discription of the group states: "The intent is to share ideas, 
=
questions, and comments regarding the implementation, theory, and 
possible=

the questions a=

answers in that conte=
xt.

ch=

explaination. Any pe=

frustration regarding a percie=

I take the subject matter seriousl=

reasonably point specific response.

Andy
